description:
Fork of zpydr/gnome-shell-extension-taskbar to support newer versions of GNOME 

TaskBar 2020 displays icons of running applications on the top panel or alternatively on a new bottom panel. Activate, minimize or close tasks with a simple click. 

TaskBar 2020 is a dock-like windows list on the top/bottom bar. 

Please submit issues to: https://github.com/c0ldplasma/gnome-shell-extension-taskbar/issues/new
name: TaskBar 2020
